content: Today, Peppa is going to the park.
cn: 今天 佩奇一家人要去公园

content: It's freezing cold!
cn: 我觉得今天好冷啊

content: It is cold!
cn: 确实是很冷

content: Quick! Let's get our warm clothes on!
cn: 来 我们把保暖衣服穿上

content: On cold days, Peppa and her family
cn: 天气这么冷 佩奇一家

content: wear their hats and scarves and coats.
cn: 戴了帽子 围巾 还穿了大衣

content: I'll put the roof up.
cn: 我把顶篷升起来

content: Ooh, And let's get the heating on.
cn: 哦 把暖气也打开吧

content: Everyone nice and warm?
cn: 大家都暖和了吧

content: Yes, Daddy Pig!
cn: 是的 爸爸

content: Then let's go!
cn: 那我们出发啦

content: This is the park.
cn: 这儿就是公园

content: We're here!
cn: 我们到了

content: Hooray!
cn: 好哎

content: Mummy,
cn: 妈妈

content: why are all the leave red and yellow?
cn: 为什么叶子都是黄色和红色的呢

content: It's Autumn time, Peppa.
cn: 因为现在是秋天了 佩奇

content: In the Autumn, it gets a bit colder
cn: 在秋天 天气会变凉

content: and the leaves change color.
cn: 树叶的颜色会变黄

content: It's quite windy.
cn: 这风真不小啊

content: Let's play a game to keep warm.
cn: 我们来玩球 让身体暖起来

content: My turn!
cn: 轮到我了

content: Oh, it's not meant to go that away.
cn: 哦 球不应该往那个方向滚的

content: The wind is blowing the ball along!
cn: 大风把球吹得好远好远

content: The ball is in the pond!
cn: 球掉到池塘里去了

content: Hmmm, I'll just use this stick to reach it.
cn: 恩 我用这根树枝把它取出来吧

content: Just a bit further, Daddy.
cn: 再稍微远一点 爸爸

content: Be careful, Daddy Pig
cn: 小心点儿啊 猪爸爸

content: Don't worry! I've almost got it.
cn: 别担心 我快要拿到了

content: Daddy, is the water cold?
cn: 爸爸 水里面冷不冷啊

content: A little bit.
cn: 有一点点冷

content: The wind has blown the ball out of the pond.
cn: 大风又把球吹出了池塘

content: That's lucky!
cn: 太幸运了

content: Yes, what a stroke of luck!
cn: 是啊 确实运气不错

content: It's getting even windier,
cn: 现在风好像刮得更大了

content: Hold onto your hats.
cn: 大家把帽子戴紧

content: Oh no! The wind has blown George's hat off.
cn: 不好 大风把乔治的帽子吹跑了

content: Don't worry George!
cn: 别担心 乔治

content: Daddy Pig will catch your hat!
cn: 爸爸会找回你的帽子的

content: Quick, Daddy!
cn: 快啊 爸爸

content: Look! It's in that little tree!
cn: 瞧 帽子跑到树上去了

content: Hmmm. I'll just climb up and get it.
cn: 嗯 那我就爬上去把它拿下来

content: The tree's much too thin
cn: 这些树枝太细了

content: to take your weight, Daddy Pig!
cn: 根本承受不了你的重量啊

content: So, how can we get George's hat?
cn: 那么 我们怎么把帽子拿下来

content: Simple, I'll give the tree a little shake.
cn: 简单 我摇一摇树就好了

content: Hmmm, Maybe if I shake it a bit harder.
cn: 哈 看来我得摇的更厉害一点

content: I thought that sort of thing only happened to me!
cn: 我以为这种事只会发生在我身上

content: It's not funny.
cn: 一点都不好笑

content: It's a bit funny, Mummy.
cn: 还是有一点好笑的 妈妈

content: I suppose it is a bit funny.
cn: 可能是有那么一点好笑

content: Where's George's hat?
cn: 乔治的帽子在哪

content: It's on your head!
cn: 在你的头上呢

content: Here's your hat George!
cn: 你的帽子 乔治

content: Hold onto it this time!
cn: 这次要抓紧了啊

content: The wind is blowing all the leaves off the trees.
cn: 大风把树上所有的叶子都吹走了

content: Look at me! I'm living into the wind.
cn: 你看我啊 我可以躺倒在风里面

content: The wind is strong enough to hold Peppa up!
cn: 风太大了 竟然把佩奇给撑住了

content: The wind is strong enough to hold George up!
cn: 风太大了 乔治也被撑住了

content: Daddy! Have a go!
cn: 爸爸 你也来试试

content: Er. I'm a bit too heavy...
cn: 呃 我想我太重了

content: Come on, Daddy! It's really fun!
cn: 来嘛 爸爸真的很好玩

content: Oh, all right!
cn: 哦 那么好吧

content: The wind is strong enough to hold up Daddy Pig!
cn: 风太大了 竟然连猪爸爸也被撑住了

content: I say! This is fun!
cn: 要我说 真的很好玩

content: Come on, Mummy Pig! Give it a try!
cn: 快来吧 猪妈妈 你也来试试

content: But if the wind stops. I'll fall over.
cn: 但是如果风停了 我会摔倒的

content: The wind won't just stop!
cn: 这风不会一下子就停的

content: The wind has stopped.
cn: 风一下子就停了

content: It's not funny!
cn: 一点儿都不好笑

content: It is a bit funny!
cn: 这还是有一点好笑的

content: Now, the wind has stopped. What can we do?
cn: 现在风停了 我们做什么啊

content: Hmm, What's you favourite game?
cn: 嗯 你最喜欢的游戏是什么

content: Jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 我最喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去的

content: But there aren't any puddles.
cn: 但这里没有泥坑啊

content: Just lots of boring, dry leaves.
cn: 只有一堆无聊的干树叶

content: And what do you do with dry leaves?
cn: 那我们能拿干树叶做什么呢

content: I don't know.
cn: 我不知道

content: Jump up and down in them!
cn: 在干树叶里跳来跳去

content: Daddy Pig loves jumping up and down in leaves.
cn: 猪爸爸喜欢在干树叶里跳来跳去

content: Peppa loves jumping up and down in leaves.
cn: 佩奇喜欢在干树叶里跳来跳去

content: Everyone loves jumping up and down in leaves.
cn: 大家都喜欢在干树叶里跳来跳去

content: This is the best Autumn day ever!
cn: 这真是最好玩的一个秋天了
